articles.title: China Evergrande shares fall 79% on first trading day since ban lifted - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Developer postpones meeting with creditors over onshore debt to late September
articles.content:
HONG KONG -- China Evergrande Group shares plunged 79% on Monday, their first trading day following a suspension of more than 17 months.
